name: Evil Lakitu
description:
Lakitu is feeling particularly evil today. Or not? He has an assortment of mushrooms, fire flowers, one-up mushrooms, and spiny eggs that he'll drop on you, while you have to catch the mushrooms, fire flowers, and one-up mushrooms, and avoid the spiny eggs at all costs.

Brought to you by Omega Gaming, Windows only for the time being.
